summary: Frontend testing of split-layout hero design on all interior pages completed successfully. All pages (/om-oss, /erbjudanden, /sortiment, /kontakt) correctly implement the md:grid-cols-2 responsive breakpoint design. Hero images load correctly on all pages. Navigation works as expected.
passed_tests: Split-layout hero on /om-oss at desktop (1920px) - content left, image right
Split-layout hero on /om-oss at tablet (768px) - split layout active at md: breakpoint
Split-layout hero on /om-oss at tablet (1024px) - split layout active
Split-layout hero on /om-oss at mobile (375px) - stacked layout, image on top, content below
Split-layout hero on /erbjudanden at desktop (1920px) - content left, image right
Split-layout hero on /erbjudanden at mobile (375px) - stacked layout working correctly
Split-layout hero on /sortiment at desktop (1920px) - content left, image right
Split-layout hero on /sortiment at mobile (375px) - stacked layout working correctly
Split-layout hero on /kontakt at desktop (1920px) - content left, image right
Split-layout hero on /kontakt at mobile (375px) - stacked layout working correctly
Navigation from Om oss to Erbjudanden works
Navigation from Erbjudanden to Sortiment works
Navigation from Sortiment to Kontakt works
Navigation from Kontakt to Om oss works
Navigation from Om oss to Home works
Hero image on /om-oss loads correctly (2250x1500px from Pexels)
Hero image on /erbjudanden loads correctly (1200x900px from Unsplash)
Hero image on /sortiment loads correctly (1125x1500px from Pexels)
Hero image on /kontakt loads correctly (1200x675px from Unsplash)
mocked_api_note: MOCKED: Offers and categories data are stored in-memory in server.py, not in MongoDB
context_for_next_testing_agent: Split-layout hero design verified working at mobile (375px - stacked with image on top), tablet (768px, 1024px - side-by-side), and desktop (1920px - side-by-side). All hero images load correctly from Pexels/Unsplash CDN.
